title: Web-Based Computer Science Laboratory Education: FTP Network Service Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of computer networking, understanding of file management systems, and fundamental programming concepts
context.additional_context: Intermediate-level computer science education program for corporate retraining, operating a practice-centered formative assessment system

learning_goals: Explain basic operating principles of FTP protocol and apply them to actual file transfer scenarios
Construct FTP sessions directly and analyze command execution results using Java-based experimental tools
Identify error conditions in network services and propose troubleshooting procedures
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
